about_the_game:
We offer you video games to exercise regularly from home, on demand, with friends, family or colleagues! It’s fun, sporty, and it’s new! 

We all know that sport is good for health, at Sporty Peppers we know that the first step is sometimes difficult, besides finding a fitness center, registering, going there can be difficult. And for our health it is necessary to make it a long-term commitment!  

This is why we offer you a fun and easy-to-access solution for daily use without dedicated equipment, all with a strong social and collective aspect. 

 You will discover this new concept which allows you to motivate yourself to move thanks to video games broadcasted on your computer with Sporty Games (software installed on the computer) and a detection of movements via your smartphone with Sporty Tracker (iPhone & Android app).  

Quickly set up your session:  

– Create your account the first time,  
– You are represented by an avatar,  
– Play and move! 

The Sporty Peppers platform is designed as a great sports party game! Online multiplayer sessions will give rhythm to your sessions and challenge you with your friends or the whole world! The choice is yours! 

Play to:   

🏃 FAST LIBERO 🏃 Enter the track and avoid the defenders!  

In this three-phase race, in groups of 5, be the fastest to reach the end of the field by dodging against the holograms of your opponents (7 minutes of running, squats and jumps - about 7 min depending on your speed).

Any questions?
